attributes.action: ask our athletes and the UK olympic committee to boycot the opening ceramony of the Beijing Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Request that our athletes boycot the opening ceramony at the Chinese olympics 2008.

If athletes agreed that the opening ceremony be boycotted instead of the whole games, it would avoid 'punishing' the athletes and at the same time send out a very strong message to the government of China about their actions over Tibet. 

This alternate would allow an effective demonstration, the least we might expect.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
